text: George Lawley (10 April 1903 – 7 April 1987) was an English professional footballer who played as a winger for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:1987 deaths Category:People from Wolverhampton Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Darlaston Town F.C. players Category:Bloxwich Strollers F.C. players Category:Walsall F.C. players Category:Burton Town F.C. players Category:Merthyr Town F.C. players Category:Dundee F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Swindon Town F.C. players Category:Worcester City F.C. players Category:Shrewsbury Town F.C. players Category:Brierley Hill Alliance F.C. players Category:Dudley Town F.C. players Category:Hednesford Town F.C. players Category:Cannock Town F.C. players Category:Nuneaton Borough F.C. players Category:Bournville Athletic F.C. players Category:English Football League players
